p: The CT max data from the F 1 generation were compared to the CT max data of wild fish tested on-site in India ( Fig. 3). Randomly selected subsets of fish from 10 sites ( Fig. 1: sites 3–12) of the collection event in October 2016 ( n = 4–10 per site) were used as described above for Experiment 1 (where CT max of fish from site 8 is described).
